snippet: Novak Djokovic defeated No. 2 Roger Federer, 7-6 (6), 7-5, on Monday in the final match of the ATP World Tour Finals in London.
abstract: Novak Djokovic defeats Roger Federer to win ATP Finals tennis tournament in London.
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic defeated No. 2 Roger Federer, 7-6 (6), 7-5, on Monday in the final match of the ATP World Tour Finals in London.

headline.seo: Novak Djokovic Downs Roger Federer to Win ATP Finals
headline.main: Djokovic Downs Federer to Win ATP Finals
